text: Avroult is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A village located 10 miles (16 km) southwest of Saint-Omer, at the junction of the D928 with the D133 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The sixteenth century church of St. Omer. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de- Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Avroult
